about.title: About Me
about.description: Hi, I'm Sujata I'm a Master of Science student in Computer Science and Engineering at Tampere University specializing in Imaging. I have 3 years of job experience in India. I am experienced in machine learning, 3D image reconstruction, and software development. I am always keen on deep-diving into problems and at the same time open to broadening my knowledge of new technologies and challenges.
